mapper.select: select vote_no as voteNo, emp_name as empName, vote_title as voteTitle, vote_content as voteContent, vote_start as voteStart, vote_end as voteEnd from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from tbl_vote join tbl_emp using(emp_code) order by vote_no desc ) a ) where rnum between #{startCount} and #{endCount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_vote ( vote_no, emp_code, vote_title, vote_content, vote_end ) values ( #{voteNo}, #{empCode}, #{voteTitle}, #{voteContent}, #{voteEnd} )
insert into tbl_votelist ( votelist_no, vote_no, vote_name ) values ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(seq_votelist.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{voteNo}, #{voteVal} )
mapper.select: select vote_no as voteNo, emp_code as empCode, emp_name as empName, vote_title as voteTitle, vote_content as voteContent, vote_start as voteStart, vote_end as voteEnd from tbl_vote join tbl_emp using(emp_code) where vote_no = #{voteNo}
select votelist_no as voteListNo, vote_no as voteNo, vote_name as voteName, vote_count as voteCount from tbl_voteList where vote_no = #{voteNo}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_participation ( vote_no, emp_code, votelist_no ) values ( #{voteNo}, #{empCode}, #{voteListNo} )
mapper.select: select emp_name as empName, ( select p.votelist_no from tbl_participation p where p.emp_code = e.emp_code and vote_no = #{voteNo} ) as voteListNo from tbl_emp e
select emp_code from tbl_emp where emp_code != #{empCode} and emp_retire = 'n' and team_code is not null
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_alarm ( alarm_no, emp_code, alarm_comment, ref_url, url_param ) values ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || LPAD(seq_alarm.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{empCode}, #{alarmComment}, #{refUrl}, #{urlParam} )
